sentences: Täna õhtul meil on õhtusöök kodus.
context: The word 'õhtusöök' is a compound noun in Estonian. It consists of two parts: 'õhtu' (evening) and 'söök' (meal). This literally translates to 'evening meal'. In English, this would most commonly be referred to as 'dinner', which is typically the main evening meal in many cultures. The word specifically denotes a meal consumed in the evening or at night.
